translation: Vniv, bh chuhs pnah mngan ansann hndis rb sund.

Ts vsvsh travan vạlụ̄ sndi shr nishhi yus gri gri pvt phyrit yivan chuh. (yʿny akhi ltthi yylhi vsvsh trạvith ddalns mnz kamyab chuhnh gczhan pth chuh byyhi drandạzy kran th yih kvshsh chuh pyvttuhs pytth kran)
Yus lukn hndyn diln mnz chuh vsvsh travan.
Khvah suh jinv mnz ạsitn ya ansanav mnz. (yʿny yih vsvsh travn vvl khvah ansanv mnz ạsitn ya jinv (shyaṭynav) mnz, doshvnhi hndi shr nishhi chuhs pnah mngan).
